de.upb.t2t.control

Class Statics

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.upb.t2t.control.Statics

  • public class Statics
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides static functionalities, such as, for example, directory paths or commonly used methods.
    Author:
    Michel May (michel-may@gmx.de)

      • REGEX_BROAD_PHONETIC_SYMBOLS

        public static final java.lang.String REGEX_BROAD_PHONETIC_SYMBOLS

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

    • Method Detail

      • parseBoolean

        public static boolean parseBoolean(java.lang.String string)
        Parses a boolean from the given String. That String may either be of the form true/false or 1/ 0. Like Boolean.parseBoolean(String), it will will also return false if the String was badly formatted and not throw an exception.
        Parameters:
        string - the String to parse
        Returns:
        the respective boolean value

      • getAllRegexMatches

        public static java.util.List<java.util.regex.MatchResult> getAllRegexMatches(java.lang.String input,
                                                                             java.lang.String regex)
        A convenience function that returns a list of all match results to be found in the given input String.
        Parameters:
        input - the String to search for the given regex pattern.
        regex - the regex pattern to search the given String with.
        Returns:
        a list of all match results to be found.
